title: Planet Earth Diaries - Shot in the Dark

asset.author: TheBBCStore
asset.hookText: Lions hunting elephants has only ever been seen by a handful of people, so the crew were up against it when trying to film this rare behaviour. Using infrared technology they were able to track a pride of lions through the African night, but when they finally got the shots they wanted it was a saddening experience for all.
